clues.text: The first gold discovered in this state was found along the Russian River & Kenai Peninsula around 1849

clues.text: A hired killer syndicate of the 1930s got this name from the press; it didn't actually have shareholders

This number day in June is
Juneteenth, commemorating the Emancipation Proclamation

rounds.text: Speechwriter Samuel Rosenman said FDR "attached no importance to" this phrase, "two monosyllables" in a 1932 speech
